text: Novak Djokovic was the defending champion, but lost in the semifinals to Daniil Medvedev. Medvedev went on to win his first ATP Masters 1000 title, defeating David Goffin in the final, 7–6(7–3), 6–4. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky losers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ====Fifth qualifier==== ====Sixth qualifier==== ====Seventh qualifier==== ==References== *Main draw *Qualifying draw Men's Singles Western & Southern Open – Singles
title: 2019 Western & Southern Open – Men's Singles
